channel.title: Seyo | Autonomous Supply Chain
channel.description: Recent content on Seyo | Autonomous Supply Chain

item.title: QA Engineer
item.description: Role As a QA Engineer, you will be working with a passionate group of cross-disciplinary engineers to design and develop test suites involving all the software and hardware components of the Seyo platform. You will be creating state-of-art testing solutions that bring robots to life and ensure their reliability. You will be able to see the results of your work both in a 3D simulation environment and in a live testing warehouse where real robots will operate according to your instructions.
